You can create an HomingPigeon Candlestick Pattern indicator that requires manual update. The following reference table describes the HomingPigeon constructor.

HomingPigeon()1/2

            HomingPigeon QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns.HomingPigeon (
     string  name
   )

Initializes a new instance of the HomingPigeon class using the specified name.

Parameters
string name The name of this indicator.

Return

HomingPigeon - The new HomingPigeon indicator object.

HomingPigeon()2/2

            HomingPigeon QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns.HomingPigeon (
   )

Initializes a new instance of the HomingPigeon class.

Parameters
This constructor does not take any argument.

HomingPigeon - The new HomingPigeon indicator object.

Definition at line 54 of file CandlestickPatterns/HomingPigeon.cs.


You can update the indicator automatically or manually.

Automatic Update

Create a consolidator and then call the RegisterIndicator method to update the indicator with the consolidated bars.

using QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns;

private HomingPigeon _homingpigeon;

// In Initialize()
_homingpigeon = new HomingPigeon(name);
_homingpigeon.Updated += IndicatorUpdateMethod;

var thirtyMinuteConsolidator = new TradeBarConsolidator(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(30));
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

RegisterIndicator(symbol, _homingpigeon, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

// In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if (_homingpigeon.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _homingpigeon.Current.Value;
}
from QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns import HomingPigeon
    
# In Initialize()
self.homingpigeon = HomingPigeon(name)
self.homingpigeon.Updated += self.IndicatorUpdateMethod

thirty_minute_consolidator = TradeBarConsolidator(timedelta(minutes=30))
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirty_minute_consolidator)

self.RegisterIndicator(symbol, self.homingpigeon, thirty_minute_consolidator)

# In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if self.homingpigeon.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.homingpigeon.Current.Value

Manual Update

Updating your indicator manually enables you to control when the indicator is updated and what data you use to update it. To manually update the indicator, call the Update method that with a TradeBar. The indicator will only be ready after you prime it with enough data.

using QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns;
    
private HomingPigeon _homingpigeon;
private Symbol symbol;

// In Initialize()
_homingpigeon = new HomingPigeon();
symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;

// In OnData()
if (data.Bars.ContainsKey(_symbol))
{
    _homingpigeon.Update(data.Bars[symbol]);
}
if (_homingpigeon.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _homingpigeon.Current.Value;
}
from QuantConnect.Indicators.CandlestickPatterns import HomingPigeon
    
# In Initialize()
self.homingpigeon = HomingPigeon()
self.symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol

# In OnData()
if data.Bars.ContainsKey(self.symbol):
    self.homingpigeon.Update(data.Bars[self.symbol])
if self.homingpigeon.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.homingpigeon.Current.Value
